Uh Yeah!! I would too!

Thanks for posting this :)

  ----- Original Messag=
e ----- 
  From: Misty Dawn 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesd=
ay, April 08, 2009 11:05 AM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] EVPmaker software


      =
  Stefan Bion is a member here and he makes his evpmaker software freely av=
ailable on his website (thanks Stefan!). He also disagrees with those who a=
re reselling his software on cd without his permission.  

        http://w=
ww.stefanbion.de/evpmaker/index_e.htm for the english version

        Mist=
y

        --- On Wed, 4/8/09, April Abercrombie <april@abercrombieghostres=
earch.com> wrote:


          From: April Abercrombie <april@abercrombiegho=
stresearch.com>
          Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.=

          To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
          Date: Wednesday, April 8, =
2009, 9:35 AM


          Wow! Those are pretty clear! And I have to say th=
at I approve of the color. Purple is my favorite LOL!!!

          You know=
, I used to have on my computer little program that I downloaded called "EV=
P Maker". I wonder if that is the same EVP maker you mentioned on this site=
. Unfortunately I lost it when I had to reformat my machine, and could not =
find the link to the original download. I believe I found the original link=
 from the "Shadowlands" website, if I remember correctly.

          Beside=
s that, this was YEARS ago, and I really did not understand how to use it, =
or even what it was for.

            ----- Original Message ----- 
       =
     From: Frank Sumption 
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
      =
      Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:12 PM
            Subject: Re: [EVP-I=
TC] Some more from last month.


            Yeah, see http://purplealieng =
irl.tripod. com/ 


            On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 9:01 PM, April Aberc=
rombie <april@abercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:

              Realy??=
 Sweet!

                ----- Original Message ----- 
                From=
: Frank Sumption 
                To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
           =
     Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 8:55 PM
                Subject: Re: [EV=
P-ITC] Some more from last month.


                Well, one anyway. ;-]

=

                On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 at 8:42 PM, April Abercrombie <april@a=
bercrombiegh ostresearch. com> wrote:

                  Do you?

         =
           ----- Original Message ----- 
                    From: Frank Su=
mption 
                    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com 
                 =
   Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 8:28 PM
                    Subject: Re: [=
EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.


                    This one isn't as=
 clear, at 2 seconds "got aliens in that house"


                    On Tu=
e, Apr 7, 2009 at 8:20 PM, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@ gmail.com> wrot=
e:

                       That's probably cuz I send most of these as e-ma=
il attachments, and they don't go to group, yahoo stips off any attachments=
.

                       F-S


                      On Tue, Apr 7, 2009 a=
t 4:02 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wrote:

      =
                  Kristin,
                        I have the same problem =
also. When I click on the link a window pops up saying thast the URL is not=
 correct...or has been moved.
                        Al 


               =
         ---------- Original Message ----------
                        Fro=
m: "Kristin Morris" <ckmorris95@sbcgloba l.net>
                        To:=
 <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com>

                        Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC]=
 Some more from last month.
                        Date: Tue, 7 Apr 2009 1=
6:14:18 -0500


                        Frank.  My computer just won=E2=80=
=99t open these clips.  Very frustrating for me.  I know it=E2=80=99s a pai=
n in the arse to load them in the files section instead of just adding as a=
n attachment but maybe that might help?  Then again if it is just me with t=
he problem then no worries.  I love computers and hate them at the same tim=
e!!  
                        k

------------------------------------------=
--------------

                        From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com [mai=
lto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com] On Behalf Of Frank Sumption
                 =
       Sent: Tuesday, April 07, 2009 9:45 AM 

                        To: =
grassharp@yahoogrou ps.com; evp-itc@yahoogroups .com

                     =
   Subject: [EVP-ITC] Some more from last month.
                         I=
 rarely know if anyone hears this stuff, as few comment. The one about saus=
age is kinda iffy."Princess, I never Liked that box..." is the same on as "=
Princess I love that box...", I just hear it different this morning. That's=
 the only one I hear different from last night. I included the forward, and=
 reverse components. 
                         These are from the test I di=
d to see if I could use a pre-recorded RAW audio tape in areas wherer there=
's no radio stations, sincve many insist on going to "haunted locations" th=
at have few, if any radio stations to use for the raw audio. #48 has an aux=
 input so other raw audio can be used.
                         Frank-S
